Uses of Class
taxi.resource.CustomerInfo

  • Packages that use CustomerInfo 
    Package Description
    taxi.resource  

    • Uses of CustomerInfo in taxi.resource

      Methods in taxi.resource that return CustomerInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CustomerInfo CustomerInfo.wrap(Customer c)
      wrap method This method is used to transform a Customer object to CustomerInfo object
      Methods in taxi.resource with parameters of type CustomerInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response EditAccountResource.customerAddress(CustomerInfo customerInfo, long customerId)
      customerAddress method receives PUT requests at path /editaccount/CustomerAddress/x where x = numeric customer ID It is called when a customer needs to change his address This method receives as input JSON (includes the new address).
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response EditAccountResource.customerCreditCard(CustomerInfo customerInfo, long customerId)
      customerCreditCard method receives PUT requests at path /editaccount/CustomerCreditCard/x where x = numeric customer ID It is called when a customer needs to change his credit card's info This method receives as input JSON (includes the new credit card).
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response EditAccountResource.customerEmail(CustomerInfo customerInfo, long customerId)
      customerEmail method receives PUT requests at path /editaccount/CustomerEmail/x where x = numeric customer ID It is called when a customer needs to change his email This method receives as input JSON (includes the new email).
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response RegistrationResource.registerCustomer(CustomerInfo customerInfo)
      registerCustomer method receives POST requests at path /register/customer This method is called when a customer is registered to the system.
